question: Which of the following is considered a supervised learning algorithm?
What does overfitting in machine learning typically mean?
correctAnswer: The model performs well on training data but poorly on unseen data
incorrectAnswers: The model performs well on both training and test data

question: Which optimization algorithm uses momentum to accelerate gradient descent?

correctAnswer: To prevent overfitting by randomly ignoring neurons during training
incorrectAnswers: To improve accuracy by adding neurons
